CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1949, pg. 10, reads: "Les Chevoushantes - Members of the Gay Riding Ladies, a newly organized riding, social and civic club, were hostesses at Ebenezer Baptist Church last Sunday. They are planning a real old-fashion hay ride to be give[n] some time in June. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven members of the Gay Riding Ladies, including Gloria Golden (Grate), second from right, gathered around table in Ebenezer Baptist Church, another version
